segments.text: Wang , I'd like you to meet my friend . Dou , this is Wang .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello Wang . I'm Dou . Pleased to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pleased meet you , too , Mr . Dou .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just call me Miao Dou , Please .
segments.speaker: S2
